title: When the People Bubble Pops: Man's Evil and Deadly Overpopulation
description: When the People Bubble POPs is a clear and detailed analysis of human overpopulation of Planet Earth. This scholarly work features detailed graphs and limericks by the author. "You Don't Know Jack", a movie starring Al Pacino, Susan Sarandon, and John Goodman about Dr. Kevorkian's life, will be produced in spring, 2010, in addition to a documentary film about Dr. Kevorkian. (Artwork and music from glimmerIQs, an anthology of Dr. Kevorkian's writing published by World Audience, Inc. (www.worldaudience.org) will be featured in the movies.
author: Jack Kevorkian
